thread.section_title: SelectQuote Auto & Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SelectQuote Auto & Home | selectquoteautoandhome.com | 4 of 185
thread.title: Michael
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: Found the agent to be helpful up until the point of taking my CC and charging me for the policies. Found mistakes in one policy, but after many unanswered phone calls and emails, I reached out directly to the insurance carrier for help. Agent was only interested in closing the sale!
